Package com.tumblr.backboard

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Actor
    Coordinates the relationship between MotionImitators, Springs, and Performers on a single View.
    Actor.Builder
    Implements the builder pattern for Actor.
    Actor.Motion
    Contains the imitators and listeners coupled to a single spring.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    MotionProperty
    Used by Actor and MotionImitator to determine which axis to use when mapping from a MotionEvent.
